titleStmt.title: The wise virgin, or, A wonderfull narration of the hand of God wherein his severity and goodnesse hath appeared in afflicting a childe of eleven years of age, when stricken dumb, deaf and blinde through the prevalence of her disease, yet upon her wonderfull recovery was heard at severall times to utter many glorious truths concerning Christ, faith, and other subjects : to the wonderment of many that came far and neer to see and hear her / by James Fisher ...
titleStmt.author: Fisher, James, minister of the Gospel in Sheffield.

notesStmt.note: Contains engraved frontispiece portrait of Martha Hatfield.
Armorial bookplate of Cambridge University--T.p. verso.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
